SQL_STMT_U.val: update niederlassung_kunden set keineanzeige = 1 where niederlassung_nr=:1 and Ebene1=:2 and Ebene2=:3 and Ebene3=:4 and Ebene4=:5 and kunden_nr not in (select kdnr from kunden where (geschftsstellee=0 or geschftsstellee in (select team from team_techniker where mitarbeiter=:1 and Ebene1=:2 and Ebene2=:3 and Ebene3=:4 and Ebene4=:5) or geschftsstellee is null) and Ebene1=:2 and Ebene2=:3 and Ebene3=:4 and Ebene4=:5)

insert into NIEDERLASSUNG_KUNDEN ("Ebene1","Ebene2","Ebene3","Ebene4","Kunden_Nr","Niederlassung_Nr","keineAnzeige") select Ebene1,Ebene2,Ebene3,Ebene4,KDNR, :5 as mitarbeiter, 0 as keineAnzeige from kunden where kunden.Ebene1=:1 and kunden.Ebene2=:2 and kunden.Ebene3=:3 and kunden.Ebene4=:4
delete from NIEDERLASSUNG_KUNDEN where Ebene1=:1 and Ebene2=:2 and Ebene3=:3 and Ebene4=:4 and Niederlassung_Nr=:5

insert into NIEDERLASSUNG_KUNDEN ("Ebene1","Ebene2","Ebene3","Ebene4","Kunden_Nr","Niederlassung_Nr","keineAnzeige") select :1 ,:2, :3, :4, :6 as myKDNR, :5 as mitarbeiter, 0 as keineAnzeige where not exists (select kunden_nr from NIEDERLASSUNG_KUNDEN where Ebene1=:1 and Ebene2=:2 and Ebene3=:3 and Ebene4=:4 and Kunden_nr=:6 and Niederlassung_Nr=:5 )

update NIEDERLASSUNG_KUNDEN set App=1 from niederlassung_kunden nl join KUNDEN k on (nl.Ebene1=k.EBENE1 and nl.Ebene2=k.EBENE2 and nl.Ebene3=k.EBENE3 and nl.Ebene4=k.EBENE4 and nl.Kunden_Nr=k.KDNR) join TEAM_TECHNIKER tm on (k.Ebene1=tm.Ebene1 and k.Ebene2=tm.Ebene2 and k.Ebene3=tm.Ebene3 and k.Ebene4=tm.Ebene4 and k.smcrm_team=tm.Team and k.SMCRM_Team>0) where nl.Kunden_Nr=k.KDNR and nl.Niederlassung_Nr=tm.mitarbeiter and nl.Ebene1=:1 and nl.Ebene2=:2 and nl.Ebene3=:3 and nl.Ebene4=:4 and nl.Niederlassung_Nr=:5

Text.val: Zentraldaten zum Schluss, wenn es Daten gab
Mitarbeiter nicht auf zugelassenen Ebenen - aktuelle Ebene freigeben

SQL_STMT_U.val: update niederlassung_kunden set keineanzeige = 1 where niederlassung_nr=:1 and Ebene1=:2 and Ebene2=:3 and Ebene3=:4 and Ebene4=:5 and kunden_nr not in (select kdnr from kunden where (geschftsstellee=0 or geschftsstellee in (select team from team_techniker where mitarbeiter=:1 and Ebene1=:2 and Ebene2=:3 and Ebene3=:4 and Ebene4=:5) or geschftsstellee is null) and ((Ebene1=:6 and Ebene2=:7 and Ebene3=:8 and Ebene4=:9) or (Ebene1=:2 and Ebene2=:3 and Ebene3=:4 and Ebene4=:5)))

insert into NIEDERLASSUNG_KUNDEN ("Ebene1","Ebene2","Ebene3","Ebene4","Kunden_Nr","Niederlassung_Nr","keineAnzeige") select Ebene1,Ebene2,Ebene3,Ebene4,KDNR, :5 as mitarbeiter, 0 as keineAnzeige from kunden where kunden.Ebene1=:1 and kunden.Ebene2=:2 and kunden.Ebene3=:3 and kunden.Ebene4=:4
delete from NIEDERLASSUNG_KUNDEN where Ebene1=:1 and Ebene2=:2 and Ebene3=:3 and Ebene4=:4 and Niederlassung_Nr=:5

insert into NIEDERLASSUNG_KUNDEN ("Ebene1","Ebene2","Ebene3","Ebene4","Kunden_Nr","Niederlassung_Nr","keineAnzeige") select :1 ,:2, :3, :4, :6 as myKDNR, :5 as mitarbeiter, 0 as keineAnzeige where not exists (select kunden_nr from NIEDERLASSUNG_KUNDEN where Ebene1=:1 and Ebene2=:2 and Ebene3=:3 and Ebene4=:4 and Kunden_nr=:6 and Niederlassung_Nr=:5 )

insert into NIEDERLASSUNG_KUNDEN ("Ebene1","Ebene2","Ebene3","Ebene4","Kunden_Nr","Niederlassung_Nr","keineAnzeige") select distinct :3, :4, :5, :6, :2 as myKDNR, :1 as mitarbeiter, 0 as keineAnzeige from kunden where kunden.kdnr=1 and not exists (select kunden_nr from NIEDERLASSUNG_KUNDEN where Ebene1=:3 and Ebene2=:4 and Ebene3=:5 and Ebene4=:6 and Kunden_nr=:2 and Niederlassung_Nr=:1 )

insert into NIEDERLASSUNG_KUNDEN ("Ebene1","Ebene2","Ebene3","Ebene4","Kunden_Nr","Niederlassung_Nr","keineAnzeige") select distinct :3, :4, :5, :6, :2 as myKDNR, :1 as mitarbeiter, 0 as keineAnzeige from kunden where kunden.kdnr=1 and not exists (select kunden_nr from NIEDERLASSUNG_KUNDEN where Ebene1=:3 and Ebene2=:4 and Ebene3=:5 and Ebene4=:6 and Kunden_nr=:2 and Niederlassung_Nr=:1 )

insert into NIEDERLASSUNG_KUNDEN ("Ebene1","Ebene2","Ebene3","Ebene4","Kunden_Nr","Niederlassung_Nr","keineAnzeige") select :6,:7,:8,:9,KDNR, :5 as mitarbeiter, 0 as keineAnzeige from kunden where kunden.Ebene1=:1 and kunden.Ebene2=:2 and kunden.Ebene3=:3 and kunden.Ebene4=:4 and not exists (select 1 from NIEDERLASSUNG_KUNDEN where Ebene1=:6 and Ebene2=:7 and Ebene3=:8 and Ebene4=:9 and Niederlassung_Nr=:5 and kunden_nr=kunden.kdnr)

update NIEDERLASSUNG_KUNDEN set App=1 from niederlassung_kunden nl join KUNDEN k on (nl.Ebene1=k.EBENE1 and nl.Ebene2=k.EBENE2 and nl.Ebene3=k.EBENE3 and nl.Ebene4=k.EBENE4 and nl.Kunden_Nr=k.KDNR) join TEAM_TECHNIKER tm on (k.Ebene1=tm.Ebene1 and k.Ebene2=tm.Ebene2 and k.Ebene3=tm.Ebene3 and k.Ebene4=tm.Ebene4 and k.smcrm_team=tm.Team and k.SMCRM_Team>0) where nl.Kunden_Nr=k.KDNR and nl.Niederlassung_Nr=tm.mitarbeiter and nl.Ebene1=:1 and nl.Ebene2=:2 and nl.Ebene3=:3 and nl.Ebene4=:4 and nl.Niederlassung_nr=:5
